Personal Computer World magazine index

PCW • Sep 1979 — Vol. 2 № 5

Home • Magazines • Items • Writers • Code Listings • Computers • missing issues

Previous « Online PDF » Next

The first issue of a new and much more professional look and with new sections including the “PCW Benchtest”, the “Computer Answers” column, and “Young Computer World”; also bigger due to more adverts.
